  1. uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient

Uses of Package
uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient

  • Classes in uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient used by uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient
    Class
    Description
    AttributeService
    Service class for fetching user attributes from ScotAccount API.
    CustomOAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient
    Custom implementation of OAuth2AccessTokenResponseClient for handling token exchange with ScotAccount.
    JwtUtil
    Utility class for handling JWT operations in the ScotAccount client application.
    LoginController
    Controller responsible for handling OAuth2/OIDC authentication outcomes in the Scotaccount client application.
